review_title: Too pricey for what it is
one_reviews_text: I like the lo-fi trippy style of this, but it's just too much narrative and not enough interaction for the price. The puzzles are a bit awkard and glitchy. It's like watching a low-budget romance movie in 3-D with just enough button-pushing to keep you awake. Definitely not for someone who has gone through a break-up, either. Somewhat preachy and the characters are unlikeable. Great style and feel, just not much else. Price needs to come down on this.
